      • login

        public static SessionClient login(java.lang.String uid,
                                  java.lang.String pswdPlain)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException,
                                  java.sql.SQLException,
                                  java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Login and return a client instance (with session managed by jserv).
        Parameters:
        uid -
        pswdPlain -
        Returns:
        null if failed, a SessionClient instance if login succeed.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the request makes server generate wrong SQL.
        io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException - Request can not parsed correctly
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - other error
        Exception, - most likely the network failed
        java.io.IOException

      • readOnly

        public static SessionClient readOnly(java.lang.String uid,
                                     java.lang.String pswdPlain)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Get a insecure client - for no session handling request.
        Parameters:
        uid -
        pswdPlain -
        Returns:
        a client can only read data from server.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • servUrl

        static java.lang.String servUrl(io.odysz.semantic.jprotocol.JMessage.Port port)
        Helper for generate serv url (with configured server root and db connection ID).
        Parameters:
        port -
        Returns:
        url, e.g. http://localhost:8080/query.serv?conn=null
